mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COLLEGE ORDER BY COL_ID

SELECT A.DEPT_ID, A.DEPT_NAME, A.COL_NAME, A.DEPT_FL , B.COL_GWAN , C.GWAN_SFL, C.GWAN_EFL FROM DEPARTMENT A INNER JOIN COLLEGE B ON(A.COL_NAME = B.COL_NAME) LEFT OUTER JOIN GWAN C ON(B.COL_GWAN = C.GWAN_NAME) WHERE A.COL_NAME = #{colName}

WITH FLOORROOM AS( SELECT
CASE WHEN ROOM_NO-(#{pickFl}*100) < 100 AND ROOM_NO-(#{pickFl}*100) > 0 THEN ROOM_NO ELSE NULL
END ROOM_NO , ROOM_USE, ROOM_LIMIT FROM ROOM WHERE GWAN_NAME = #{gwanName} ) SELECT * FROM FLOORROOM WHERE ROOM_NO IS NOT NULL
